Title: Establishes a public database of the rental histories of rent stabilized buildings in cities with N.Y. city
Summary: Requires the state division of housing and community renewal to establish a publicly accessible database of the complete rental histories of rent stabilized accommodations in cities with a population of one million or more no later than December 31, 2024.
LawCode: Amd §12-a, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §20, Pub Hous L; amd §§26-517 & 26-516, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 576 of the laws of 1974, constituting the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, the public housing law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a database of the complete rental histories of rent stabilized buildings in cities with a population of one million or more
